snippet: J. Tomilson Hill, a well-known deal maker in the 1980s, has reinvented himself. | A former SAC analyst told a jury he was pressured to obtain insider data. | Peter Chernin has turned to Japanese anime for his latest investment. | Apple bought a...
abstract: J. Tomilson Hill, a well-known deal maker in the 1980s, has reinvented himself. | A former SAC analyst told a jury he was pressured to obtain insider data. | Peter Chernin has turned to Japanese anime for his latest investment. | Apple bought a research firm that could help it better understand what people are talking about on social media.
